com.millennialmedia.android
Class MMAdView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.ViewGroup
          android.widget.FrameLayout
              com.millennialmedia.android.MMAdView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable.Callback, KeyEvent.Callback, View.OnClickListener, ViewManager, ViewParent
public class MMAdView
extends FrameLayout
implements View.OnClickListener

Main ad view class. The MMAdView class is used as a single point to integrate the MMAdView SDK into an app. After adding an MMAdView object to a layout everything else is taken care of including: downloading ads, displaying ads, and showing various overlays when users click on an ad.

Since:
Jan 18, 2010

public static final String KEY_EDUCATION

Constructor Detail

MMAdView

public MMAdView(Activity context)
Constructor to create an MMAdView for conversion tracking use only. This constructor should not be used if serving ads.

MMAdView

public MMAdView(Activity context,
                String apid,
                String adType,
                boolean accelerate,
                Hashtable<String,String> metaMap)
Constructor to create an interstitial or prestitial ad unit only.

Parameters:
context - The activity that the MMAdView will be shown in.
apid - Developer specific APID.
adType - Type of ad to display. This should be either "MMFullScreenAdLaunch" or "MMFullScreenAdTransition".
metaMap - Hash table of meta values: demographics, ad layout, etc.
accelerate - If you will allow ads with accelerometer support.
See Also:
REFRESH_INTERVAL_OFF

MMAdView

public MMAdView(Activity context,
                String apid,
                String adType,
                int refreshInterval)
Constructor to create an MMAdView with a context, apid, and refresh interval.

Parameters:
context - The activity that the MMAdView will be shown in.
apid - Developer specific apid.
adType - Type of ad to display.
refreshInterval - The interval in seconds to refresh ads.
See Also:
REFRESH_INTERVAL_OFF

MMAdView

public MMAdView(Activity context,
                String apid,
                String adType,
                int refreshInterval,
                Hashtable<String,String> metaMap)
Constructor to create an MMAdView with a context, apid, refresh interval, and meta info.

Parameters:
context - The activity that the MMAdView will be shown in.
apid - Developer specific apid.
adType - Type of ad to display.
refreshInterval - The interval in seconds to refresh ads.
metaMap - Hash table of meta values: demographics, ad layout, etc.
See Also:
REFRESH_INTERVAL_OFF

MMAdView

public MMAdView(Activity context,
                String apid,
                String adType,
                int refreshInterval,
                Hashtable<String,String> metaMap,
                boolean accelerate)
Constructor to create an MMAdView with a context, apid, refresh interval, meta info, and an accelerate setting.

Parameters:
context - The activity that the MMAdView will be shown in.
apid - Developer specific apid.
adType - Type of ad to display.
refreshInterval - The interval in seconds to refresh ads.
metaMap - Hash table of meta values: demographics, ad layout, etc.
accelerate - If you will allow ads with accelerometer support.
See Also:
REFRESH_INTERVAL_OFF

Method Detail

callForAd

public void callForAd()
Perform a manual refresh of the ad view. The refresh interval must be set to REFRESH_INTERVAL_OFF for this to work.

See Also:
REFRESH_INTERVAL_OFF

check

public boolean check()
Check on the cached ad status of this MMAdView.

Returns:
True if a cached ad has been downloaded and can be displayed.

display

public boolean display()
Displays the cached ad for this MMAdView if possible.

Returns:
True if the ad was successfully displayed.

fetch

public void fetch()
Fetch a new cached ad. Once the caching is completed expect to receive an ad cached callback

getListener

public MMAdView.MMAdListener getListener()
Use this method to get the current listener object.

Returns:
listener An object that implemented MMAdListener.
See Also:
MMAdView#MMAdListener

halt

public void halt()
Method to manually pause or stop the refresh timer. This should not be called normal activity life cycle events. Do not call when ad is offscreen, etc.

setIgnoresDensityScaling

public void setIgnoresDensityScaling(boolean ignoresDensityScaling)
Setting to disable or enable any automatic scaling of the ad view content on high density devices. For example, on a high-density screen a 320x53 banner ad may appear to be stretched. Set this value to true to avoid the stretching and to show the banner ad in a smaller portion of the screen. Default value is false.

Parameters:
ignoresDensityScaling - The new setting value.

setIncome

public void setIncome(String income)
Set the meta value income.

Parameters:
income - The income.
See Also:
KEY_INCOME

startConversionTrackerWithGoalId

public static void startConversionTrackerWithGoalId(Context context,
                                                    String goalId)
This method executes goal tracking for application download conversions. This is the preferred method to use over the non-static version.

Parameters:
goalId - The goal id for the application.
context - The current context.

startConversionTrackerWithGoalId

public void startConversionTrackerWithGoalId(String goalId)
This method executes goal tracking for application download conversions. The preferred method of conversion tracking is to use the similarly named static method.

Parameters:
goalId - The goal id for the application.

updateUserLocation

public void updateUserLocation(Location userLocation)
Update user location to use with the ad request.

Parameters:
userLocation - The current location to target.
